subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Loren Roberts shot a three-under 67 to take a three-stroke lead over Fred Funk after three rounds of the Senior Players Championship in Timonium, Md. Roberts bogeyed two of the first three holes, but he rebounded to lengthen the two-shot lead he had at the midpoint of the Champion Tour’s final major tournament of the year.
